objectives.name: Complete Raven Scouting adventure to unlock it.
Find Zizel in Moon Camp.

objectives.hint: Talk to Snuggling Stone who's below the stairs over the central fountain.
objectives.name: Find the cat Zizel mentioned
Report back to Zizel about your first test of the potion.
Find Ms. Jeeves in Harvest Den.
Transform into a fish.
Ms. Jeeves needs someone with excellent swimming skills to join the crew.

objectives.hint: While the event "Collect frogs across the river and bring them back to the pot" is active, grab a frog and then jump in the water.
objectives.name: Take the frog when the pot event is ready and enter the water

objectives.hint: Talk to Mrs. Legs, the Temptress.
objectives.name: Ms. Jeeves needs someone who can produce a loud croak as a distraction.

objectives.hint: Talk to Fang, the Wise Guy. Pick up and feed him a special cabbage during "Get warclaw cubs back in their pens before they eat the cabbages"event.
objectives.name: Ms. Jeeves needs someone small, with a good nose and great jumping skills.
Complete the "Heal the wounded wolf pup" event.

objectives.hint: Talk to Mrs. Night, the Eyes and Ears.
objectives.name: Ms. Jeeves needs someone with excellent hearing and night vision as well as a loud howl.

objectives.hint: It's enough to fill it with honey once.
objectives.name: Get a jar from Blossoming Spring and fill it with Honey.
Bring the jar of honey to Mrs. Buzz.

objectives.hint: Talk to Ms. Buzz in the hive.
objectives.name: Ms. Jeeves needs a hardworking sort, used to large groups and sticky situations.

objectives.hint: Her other escort in Grasslands also works.
objectives.name: Complete "Escort Ardent Gale as she poisons valravn nests" event to talk to Ms. blood.

objectives.hint: Talk to Ms. Blood, the Assassin.
objectives.name: Ms. Jeeves needs an aerial fighter who is not afraid of a little blood.
Check back in with Ms. Jeeves to get your next instructions.
Find Mr. Ribbington in Janthir Syntri.

objectives.hint: Can be immediately aborted to proceed next.
objectives.name: Complete the adventure, Janthir Syntri: Save Woodland Creatures.

objectives.hint: Talk to Mr. Hop, the Speedster, Mr. Shadow, the Drama King, and Ms. Stripes, the Masked Bandit.
objectives.name: Mr. Ribbington needs a group of animals that can get into small spaces.

objectives.hint: Give her a Debris found on the shore during "Clean up and turn in debris collected from the shore and enemies" event.
objectives.name: Pick up Debris and bring it to Ms. Claws.

objectives.hint: Talk to Ms. Claws, the Brains.
objectives.name: Mr. Ribbington needs someone with a couple of pincers to blend in with a cast.
Defeat the Adolsecent Leviathan.

objectives.hint: Talk to Mr. Razor, the Loudmouth.
objectives.name: Mr. Ribbington needs someone who is a strong swimmer -- preferably large -- with a nasty bite.
You've found all the animals Mr. Ribbington needs. Check back in with him.
You've found all the animals. Report to Ms. Jeeves.
Ms. Jeeves is going to address the gathered crew in the cave where you found Mrs. Night.
The heist is on! It's time to report to Zizel about your findings.
